Effortlessly calculate VAT for all European Union countries with the EU VAT Calculator. Whether you're a business owner, an online seller, or a financial professional dealing with cross-border transactions, this Chrome extension is an essential tool for accurate and efficient VAT calculations. 💪✨

Key Features:
🔢 Comprehensive EU Coverage: Calculate VAT amounts for all 27 European Union member states, including Austria 🇦🇹, Belgium 🇧🇪, Cyprus 🇨🇾, Germany 🇩🇪, France 🇫🇷, and more.
🔄 Two-way Conversion: Convert prices from Net to Gross (HT to TTC) or from Gross to Net (TTC to HT) with a single click.
🌍 Country-specific VAT Rates: Access up-to-date VAT rates for each EU country, ensuring accurate calculations tailored to your needs.
⏱️ Real-time Results: Instantly view the Net Amount (HT), VAT Amount, and Gross Amount (TTC) as you input the values.
❗ Error Handling: Receive clear error messages for invalid inputs or calculations to ensure accuracy and reliability.
🖥️ User-friendly Interface: Enjoy a simple, intuitive, and visually appealing interface for seamless navigation and quick calculations.

The EU VAT Calculator is a powerful tool that streamlines your VAT calculation process, saving you time and minimizing errors. Whether you're invoicing clients, managing your e-commerce business, or conducting financial analyses, this extension is designed to meet your VAT calculation needs across the European Union. 💼💰

Make VAT calculations hassle-free and optimize your financial operations with the EU VAT Calculator. Install the extension now and simplify your VAT management for EU countries! ✅🚀
